meanings.definition: Relating to or associated with typography.
meanings.sent1: The typographic design of the book cover caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The typographic errors in the newspaper article were distracting.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat had a typographic style of knocking things off the table.
meanings.sent4: The typographic beauty of the calligraphy was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The typographic layout of the poster made the information easy to read.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the arrangement and appearance of printed matter.
meanings.sent1: The typographic choices in the magazine layout were bold and modern.
meanings.sent2: The typographic details in the brochure were carefully considered.
meanings.sent3: The typographic mix-up on the menu led to some amusing food descriptions.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting had a typographic flair that made it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The typographic elements of the logo reflected the company's brand perfectly.
